name: How to steer an alien ship
name_original: How to steer an alien ship
description:
"The aliens abducted me and brought me back to their mothership! Somehow I sneaked out my cell and managed to get in an alien fighter. It is my chance to escape, but...

 How to steer an alien ship!"

There is no time to lose. You will need to figure how the alien ship controls work to try to escape back home.  It can't be that hard to make it fly.

CONTROLS:

-Drag and Drop things around on the spaceship control with LMB 

-Press Esc to Pause the game and open the Options.

GOOD LUCK!


Credits

Music & SFX by Sidearm Studios (https://sidearmstudios.com/)

Font "Laserian" by Dan Zadorozny (http://www.iconian.com/)

Font "Free Pixel" by levelb

Color Palette by MortMort (https://twitter.com/MortMort_)
